text: Nigba ti won tu eru ounje won, won ri owo-oja won ti won da pada fun won (ninu re). Won so pe: “Baba wa, ki ni a tun n fe? Owo-oja wa niyi ti won ti da pada fun wa. A o si tun fi wa ounje ra fun awon ebi wa. A o si daabo bo obakan wa. A si maa ri alekun eru ounje (ti) rakunmi kan le ru si i. Iwon ounje kekere si niyen (lodo oba).”
